scenery.inverted_sky: sky is below and ground is above, gravity reversed, clouds falling upward, colors unnatural
scenery.memory_cascade: landscape composed of floating photograph fragments, memories fading midair
scenery.looping_bridge: bridge that loops endlessly in the sky, vanishing into itself, dreamy haze
scenery.time_rift_forest: forest frozen in multiple seasons simultaneously, color distortion everywhere
scenery.fragmented_dimension: space with chunks of reality missing, landscape stitched together from different worlds
scenery.crystal_desert: desert where sand is made of singing crystals, sunlight refracted like rainbows
scenery.floating_horizon: horizon line suspended midair, terrain dissolving beneath it
scenery.tower_of_waves: ocean waves stacked vertically into a tower, boats circling it upward
scenery.city_in_mist: city made of soft fog and light, buildings flicker in and out of view
scenery.glass_mountain: mountain range entirely transparent, light bending across its jagged edges

animal.face_blended_wolf: wolf with part-human eyes and elegant features, glowing fur, silent power

animal.neon_whale: gigantic whale floating through night sky, glowing lines across its body, stars refracting off it
animal.mechanical_kitten: adorable but eerie kitten with chrome skeleton visible beneath translucent fur
animal.melting_horse: horse mid-gallop, body melting into paint streams as it runs
animal.ghost_deer: ethereal deer glowing faintly, walking through solid objects without resistance
animal.clock_faced_fox: fox with a ticking clock as a face, tail spinning like hands
animal.cloud_snake: serpent composed of cloud segments and lightning veins, drifting through the air
animal.fractured_dog: dog with body made of stained glass, light leaking from cracks
